meanings.definition: To rest on the buttocks or haunches.
meanings.sent1: The cat sits on the mat.
meanings.sent3: The tired puppy sits down after a long walk.
meanings.sent4: The old tree sits majestically in the middle of the field.
meanings.sent5: The little girl sits on the swing, giggling happily.

meanings.sent1: The house sits on top of the hill.
meanings.sent2: The school sits next to the park.
meanings.sent3: The tiny birdhouse sits crookedly on the branch.
meanings.sent4: The ancient castle sits overlooking the village.
meanings.sent5: The small town sits peacefully by the riverbank.

meanings.definition: To occupy a seat as a member of a body of officials.
meanings.sent1: The mayor sits at the head of the council table.
meanings.sent2: She sits among the judges in the courtroom.
meanings.sent3: The king sits on his throne, listening to petitions.
meanings.sent4: The president sits in the Oval Office, making decisions.
meanings.sent5: The senator sits in the chamber, debating new laws.
